short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension restricts the opening of multiple tabs to specific Genesys Cloud URLs, ensuring that only one instance is kept open.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to use Genesys Cloud from a single browser tab.
